args: Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" . Trump claimed without evidence that federal funding to improve voter turnout in India was “a kickback... Trump claimed without evidence that federal funding to improve voter turnout in India was “a kickback scheme.” He said this while listing a number of foreign aid contracts that have been eliminated by the U.S. DOGE Service. “I would say in many cases, many of these cases, anytime you have no idea what we’re talking about, that means there’s a kickback, because nobody has any idea what’s going on,” he said. The USAID inspector’s general office regularly investigates allegations of corruption, and people have been fined or jailed for participation in kickback schemes.
